title: A Polynomial-time Metric for Outerplanar Graphs (Extended Abstract)

author: Leander Schietgat, Department of Computer Science, KU Leuven

segmentation: Good morning everyone, so I'm from the University of Leuven and the work I am presenting today on outer planar graphs is joint work with young women.
